header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Starting a joint business, travelling and doing business in foreign countries.
header.activity: A couple at home talking about setting up a joint business together.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, requesting, making arrangements

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
